narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bay Area Behavioral Group is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in San Jose, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $1.8M in Medicaid payments across 13K claims serving 2K beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $1.8M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
